com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Shutter sound will enable while capturing photos

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Camera 2api settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: The app can detect your device hardware level as JPEG or YUV.Try to use YUV format,If its supported.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Interface and hdr model
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Different features and parameters get enabled according to interface and hdr model selections.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Google sensor logic
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Google sensor logic is google ID which will allow you to get advantage of different hdr+ functions.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Sensor size
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Can fix image resolution by selecting sensor size.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Sabre and merge algorithm
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Improved saber algorithm, you need to test it yourself and turn it on as needed.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Motion photo resolution
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Long press on camera mode shutter button and motion photo video's resolution.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Raw settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: RAW Format Settings. It would help you to fix sensor size of HDR+ processing.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: SpatialGainMap fix
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: If lens shading map values not exist on c2api files, then enable SpatialGainMap fix.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Upscaling photos
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Will be able to upscal the image size according to selections.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Input manual value
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: The value will be (multiplication number you want×8= input value)

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Exposure time and iso
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It lets to set the exposure time values for different amount of light.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Lower ae target fps rate
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Value have to be integer type.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Upper ae target fps rate
EditTextPreference.android:dialogMessage: Value have to be integer type.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: HDR frames settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Shutter speed would be increased or decreased according to values of hdr+ enhanced.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Exposure compensation
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Bigger values selection will be increased brightness and lower values selection will be decrease brightness of images.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable exposure compensation
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: This item will only take effect when the exposure compensation setting is turned on.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Color transmission
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would be able to fix less color issues and it will only work if awb is off.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Load lut file
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It will get the color from your loaded png file and will be applied on the target file.

Preference.android:summary: If select lut not showing, then load .png lut file through lut loader or just move png lut file to /SGCAM/8.8.224/LUT/ directory.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Custom library
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: If stock library is not giving better results, you can load custom library from here.
Can increase the quality of photos and adjust color quality. Noise modeler may not work if you enable it.

PreferenceCategory.android:title: Wavelet Luma Denoise High Sabre Levels
Wavelet Luma Denoise Low Sabre Levels
Wavelet Luma Denoise Medium Sabre Levels

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Noise modelers
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: For Getting perfect color of your sensor have to enable it.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Auto white balance
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: For Getting perfect color of your sensor have to enable it.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Black level
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Fix green and pink tints in low-light for smd 662 and more devices.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Manual focus settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would work on all modes. Would be able to customize focal lengths.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Astro and night
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Would only work on night mode. Would be able to customize focal lengths.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Stream configs
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Set the stream configuration in different modes, fix the freeze, anti-shake, slow motion flashback, etc.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Video settings
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Bitrate, slowmo fps, video resolution exist on it. Can customize it on your way.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable manual resolution
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: If you enable it, video resolution toggle won't work. Resolution have the be customize from here.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable manual fps selection
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: If automatic doesn't work, select fps from here manually.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Lens preference name
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It will help you to set lens default preference name. Requires a restart to work.
If stock library is not giving better results, you can load custom library from here.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Save patched lib
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Patched lib will be saved on /SGCAM/PATCHED-LIB-SAVED/ directory

EditTextPreference.android:title: Custom library load directory
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Would be able to load custom libraries with custom directory. Custom libraries will be loaded from /SGCAM/LIB/ directory by default.

Preference.android:title: Import library
Preference.android:summary: It will help to move the library to target directory.

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It will help you to move the target file to the target directory.

Preference.android:title: Load lut
Preference.android:summary: It will help to move the lut file to target directory.

PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It will help you to move the target file to the target directory.

Preference.android:title: Load awb
Preference.android:summary: It will help to move the awb file to target directory.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Noise modeler
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: It will help you to move the target file to the target directory.

Preference.android:title: Load nm
Preference.android:summary: It will help you to move the target file to the target directory.
You can save XML with your name and the changelogs of your XML.Your nickname will be shown as summary and will be displayed on viewfinder.

EditTextPreference.android:hint: Add the nickname of yours
Add changelogs of your XML

EditTextPreference.android:title: XML save directory
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Would be able to save xml with custom directory. XML will save /SGCAM/XML/ directory by default.

Preference.android:title: Config save
Preference.android:summary: Configs are stored in Internal storage. Calling the window with configs by double clicking on the dark area around the shutter release.

Preference.android:title: Restore Configs
Preference.android:summary: If there are no configs in the camera, use the “Restore” function. Configs will appear automatically.

Preference.android:title: Import configs
Preference.android:summary: Search and move configs to XML save directory

Preference.android:title: Share configs
Preference.android:summary: The feature will be helped you to share configs directly from here

EditTextPreference.android:hint: Type file name of captured photo
EditTextPreference.android:title: Prefix name

EditTextPreference.android:hint: Type file name of captured photo and video
EditTextPreference.android:title: Suffix name

EditTextPreference.android:hint: Type file name of captured video
EditTextPreference.android:title: Video prefix name

EditTextPreference.android:hint: Type value of focus lock (In seconds).
EditTextPreference.android:title: Focus lock time

ListPreference.android:title: Jpeg quality
ListPreference.android:summary: Image quality may optimized according to selection: %s

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Geometric calibration raw fix
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: This will allow you to import raw dng Files to snapseed and lightroom for oneplus Devices but might increase noise in photos.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Disable hexagon
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: HDR+ processing would be fixed if it's enabled.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Sunbug fix
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Would be able to take pictures in highlighting situations..

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Disable front restart
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Switch to front cam without restart method.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable file name as xml name
com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:summary: Xml and location name will be disabled if you enable the option.

com.google.android.apps.camera.ui.prefer.android:title: Enable Disable Lib-Patchar toggle on viewfinder

Preference.android:title: Version of the modification
Preference.android:summary: You have currently installed 8.8.224.10 STABLE V17
Stay informed about updates and other news.

Preference.android:title: Thanks for helping
Preference.android:summary: Thanks to those developers who helped me for making this mod.
